website_summaries.verdict: These 13 extra-soft grips are an excellent way to bring new life to an old set of clubs.
pros: These grips are exceptionally soft, making them comfortable to hold
The size and softness makes them ideal for large hands or people with a slower swing speed
The beautiful blue-and-black design makes old clubs look fresh again
There are marks on the grips to help you center them
cons: The grips don't perform as well in wet or humid weather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Soft, tacky, and comfortable. Loved the feel of these, but they quickly wore down and are not great in wet/humid conditions. If you have a fairly high swing speed - I'm around 105 with driver - you need to grip a bit tighter than is ideal. In less than two months with probably one to two rounds a week and a few range sessions I decided to replace these with much firmer grips. That said, if you've got a slower swing speed, aren't prone to sweaty hands, and don't need to worry much about torsion control, these are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Save Money on Golf Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these grips. At one time I used 2 gloves. With these I don't use a glove. The only reason I see to use a glove is to keep the club from twisting or blisters. I use a ultra-light grip and have never had the club twist, even in the rough. And they are smooth, so no blisters. No on-and-off on every hole to putt. Talk about better pace-of-play. Beware of counterfeits. I got a set on Ebay that looked like the real deal, but they weren't tacky like these. I called Winn to see if they changed their formula. They had not. If you had never used these, you might not have noticed the difference.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Grip it and rip it with these grips!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th time I got my clubs re-gripped, and in the interest of saving some money I figured I’d try installing them myself. Still, my only grips for the past few years have been these. They feel great, fit solidly in my hands, and are perfectly tacky for a superior grip!
customer_reviews.author: Hoefje

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: These grips are very soft and spongy. I hated them. They made my clubs feel whippy and so I just kept gripping the club harder and harder, which clearly didn't help my game. Cut them off and went back to my golfpride tour wrap after 3 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great feel; Trash durability
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these feel being midsize and rubber as they take a LOT of the vibration out of misfits and allow me to lighten my grip pressure. However after 5 range sessions and 3 rounds there is CONSIDERABLE wear on them. The 7 iron grip has a flat spot worn co.pwltly through where my right thumb sits. Will look for something more durable as I don't need to replace grips 3 times a season.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Dunce

customer_reviews.title: Soft and shock absorbing Grips
customer_reviews.text: Great grip "control" with these midsize grips. Soft material allows a loose grip for arthrytic hands and absorbs shock when hitting a fat shot. Good grips for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Winn win Winn win
customer_reviews.text: Winn win Winn win. They make one of the best grips around.If your grips feel small in your hands and are hard as rocks, treat your self to these comfy grips. They not only encourage a soft grip, which allows you to feel the club head more and the tacky surface is great in all weather. Buy these and you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: VLHallTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Was able to put them on my clubs with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Was able to put them on my clubs with no problems--put my score has not improved!!! Could it be something other that the grips?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schoolfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Grips
customer_reviews.text: I needed new grips on my my golf clubs and these really fit the bill. I like the texture and the comfort and the feel. It only took a couple of hours to regrip my 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, PW, AW and Lob Wedge. I have used them and was successful, for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: love Winn DriTac grips
customer_reviews.text: I have played Winn grips for years and in my opinion these are the best. I play without a glove and these still have a good grip when it rains and even better when it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cushioned feel of these grips! I live in Florida and when playing in the heat of summer or if I get caught in the rain my hands never slip when playing with these grips.
customer_reviews.author: B. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable grips. Slightly oversize.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these grips for about 10 years. Typically re-grip once a year. Provides soft, comfortable feel. Can hit balls every day in complete comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Len T. Raley

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these grips, they are comfortable and do not rip up your hands like other grips I've used in the past. They are super comfortable and they are great when they are wet. They do not slip and I have full confidence when I swing.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Been using these grips for 15 years
customer_reviews.text: Usually get over 150 rounds before they need to be replaced. Never use golf glove. Outstanding grips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Winn Mids
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I have to replace grips every year or so. Like to keep replacements on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The grip is nice, however in only 2 weeks, they are already starting to show wear. So I guess they're not going to last more than 3-4 months. *Update: Less than 5 weeks and the grips look awful now. So my expectation of 3-4 months was too optimistic. Will have to start looking for new grips. The original grips I had before lasted over a year...... Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grips!
customer_reviews.text: Should have changed my grips years ago - finally did and shot my 2nd lowest score ever. Easy to install and a cost effective way to give yourself “new clubs”.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howell

customer_reviews.title: You need to know how to strip and clean the old grips off.  Most important.
customer_reviews.text: They went on fine, use enough liquid putting it on the tape, and putting it in the grip and rolling and moving it around so all the inside gets wet. Slide them on, then position them. Piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: ciscoguy2

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Winn grips are very tacky and just feel great. I have been using Winn grips for about 3 years now and two of my friends have changed to Winn because of the feel my clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!
customer_reviews.text: Love these grips! Last set lasted 4-5 years, in FL. They are soft and allow for good feedback and grip.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Great grips, comfortable, easy on the hands
customer_reviews.text: These are the grips that I'm used to. Replacing them myself is better and more satisfying than taking the clubs to a store or pro shop and leaving them there for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely and feel good in hand
customer_reviews.text: These fit the clubs nicely and feel good in the hand. They have been good in many different kinds of weather including rain and cold.
customer_reviews.author: dawnmski

customer_reviews.title: Super Grips!!
customer_reviews.text: These are real Winn grips. Have them on all my irons now. Could not be happier. Makes the feel on the clubs so much better. Just shot a 79 after almost 2 years!! Played a round while it was raining and the grips played perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Deepcolour

customer_reviews.title: Improve your Score
customer_reviews.text: Very solid grips. They look good and have a soft, gripping feel. Very easy to install, but make sure you get the kit.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Caiafa

customer_reviews.title: Good grips
customer_reviews.text: I love the new grips installation was easy .played in rain with good grip control.
customer_reviews.author: Jomurdo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for surprise bday for spouse. He absolutely loves them. Easy to put on. And arrives super dooper fast. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Improved grip immensely!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far. Grips remain tacky when hands are sweating. I do not like wearing gloves when golfing and these help with that. They are not super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Pure Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grips, awesome price, easy to install, I love these grips!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dachshund Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my arthritic, tender hands. Mde my new Calloway Strata Ultimate Clubs even better for me to handle!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Peck Knueven

customer_reviews.title: These grips feel great
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these grips, and the 1/8" oversize makes them fit my hands better than the standard size grips. Those two things are helping me to feel more confident and I am hitting better shots with all my irons since I replaced my standard size grips with these. The soft feel is amazing and better than any grips I have used in the past 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sands

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grip!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect grip in my opinion. Soft and tacky. Don’t have to overfrip the club to have a secure yet free connection!
customer_reviews.author: chris zelvis

customer_reviews.title: great grips
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these grips. I will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: Juat buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these grips, I installed them one night and played the next morning with them. I really liked how they are just a little bigger than normal grips and they are soft but firm at the same time. Will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: screwed up the first one by not applying enough lubricant but not problem after getting the hang of it. Love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Chattamab

customer_reviews.title: Nice diameter grips with the right amount of sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and a real improvement over my 25 year old grips. Nice amount of grip without being too sticky. Larger diameter also helps with the grip and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Big B from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my golf clubs. Easy grip, takes tension out of arms for better swings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grips I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grips. I've had several sets and rarely seen any I liked as well. A little expensive but worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A Hafey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite golf grips. Nice and tacky so they never slip. Been using them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grips, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These grips are awesome, I've used them several times. One of them had a bit of a factory defect that I didn't notice until after I installed it but I don't think it will affect the durability of the grip.

customer_reviews.title: These grips feel so soft.
customer_reviews.text: Relieved pain in my hands after long day at golf course
customer_reviews.author: Ray from rosemead

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Been using these Winn grips for a few years. Highly recommend them. The slight oversize definitly helps the old arthritic hands. Like the soft feel.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite grips!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grips. Midsize with just the right amount of tackiness to give you a solid grip. Also, quite attractive and distinctive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel. Have big hands still took a double wrap.
customer_reviews.author: advria

customer_reviews.title: ... these grips on a used club I bought and loved it. Made my old irons feel new
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these grips on a used club I bought and loved it. Made my old irons feel new. Love this grips.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great product and the feel is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the feel is awesome. Installed it on my clubs right away. Miss hits jarrIng feel is now being absorbed on the grips not in my hands. Tacky feel with gloves in or off. AWESOME!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old grips myself. These really have a great feel. I hope they last a while. Just put them on a month ago

customer_reviews.title: great grips
customer_reviews.text: mid size are perfect for my hands and the grips are comfortable with a feel for the club

customer_reviews.title: A little bit soft
customer_reviews.text: Great product and packaged well. Grips have a nice feel although a little softer than i thought they would be. Loved the little mark on the end to help you center them on the club.

customer_reviews.title: wasn't very hard to install either
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent grips very comfortable recommend for anyone that needs soft grips

customer_reviews.title: golf grips
customer_reviews.text: the golf grips I ordered were exactly what I wanted. the grips were easy to install 30min. plus 1hr to prepare clubs.

customer_reviews.title: Great tacky feel!
customer_reviews.text: I no longer feel like I'm choking the club! Great feel and control, especially around the green.

customer_reviews.title: but really like the diameter and positive

customer_reviews.text: Installed 9 weeks ago and have already worn through the thumb area of my driver.

customer_reviews.text: Great grips. I would buy again and recommend them to everyone.

customer_reviews.text: Great grips at a fair price and I doubt even a professional in a golf shop could get better results !

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great Grips
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the feel of my new grips.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The grips are performing as well as I expected. This is the third time I've replaced my grips with these Winns. I would highly recommend them because they feel great.

customer_reviews.title: A great grip
customer_reviews.text: The grips felt great and we're easy to put on

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice grips
customer_reviews.text: Nice grips. I will have my pro shop put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Nice grips. well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice grips.well worth the money.they were at my door when they said
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good grips, I got stuck in a downpour while playing a round. It passed and the grips were grippy even when wet. The blue matches my mizuno irons too
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this with the installation kit and now i do not see it with my order?
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Winn DriTac colf club grips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular grip because it matched the grip I ordered for my putter. I have heard that the Winn grip for the putter is a great improvement for golfers. I have not as yet tried it playing golf because of winter weather. It look great on my clubs and appears to be really good to the feel in my hands. Then the proof will be when I have an opportunity to put the product to the test on the golf course. I give it a five star for appearance.
customer_reviews.author: RAY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grips were great. Came about 4 business days sooner than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they feel and look great in the hand
customer_reviews.text: I fitted these myself, they feel and look great in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about winn dritac
customer_reviews.author: carl pritchard

customer_reviews.title: grip it and rip it
customer_reviews.text: These grips are some of the best I've owned. I recently bought a new gap wedge, played one round with it and to maintain consistency, replaced the stock grip with a spare Dri-Tac I had. I will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blank

customer_reviews.title: Grips are perfect for my middle age hands
customer_reviews.text: Tacky grips that are a breeze to install. I went heavy on the activator sauce when installing, no probs at all. Went with two wraps of blue printers tape, mics out to .006, so two wraps=1/32". Grips are perfect for my middle age hands. Breathed new life into an old set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K Radford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my irons. Did not last on my driver.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Havens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with these grips, I can't believe these are the real deal. Tried putting on the first grip, and (mind you I've changed plenty grips throughout my entire life), it took my over 10 min to get the first one on, and it felt like the interior of the grip bunched up, the second one went on a little easier but not much. Tried it the following day, and the grip felt mushy, not stable. Cut off both through the remaining grips away and went back to Golf Pride Mcc Plus 4...love them
customer_reviews.author: Lance Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great Winn Golf Grips
customer_reviews.text: Great Winn Golf Grips, DriTec is awesome, love them more every time I play Golf...Look great too, match my TaylorMade SLDR Tour Bags
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Grips arrived in time for Christmas and installed right after ...
customer_reviews.text: Grips arrived in time for Christmas and installed right after. Now we just need to get rid of winter in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grips even in wet conditions. Ordering a set for my newer clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Had them once before,the last ones endured about 18 months @ twice a week!
customer_reviews.author: James Carl Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Item was backordered so it took longer than was expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was backordered so it took longer than was expected. Came with a 20% off coupon on next purchase but was only valid for about 10 days after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Beard

customer_reviews.title: Dri-tac Grips
customer_reviews.text: This new product from Winn is just great. Playable when wet unlike the earlier stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not Just Any Grip!
customer_reviews.text: I had just replaced my grips last year with Mizuno's to match the irons. That was a mistake. These were not! They feel, look and perform great! Just enough tackiness that you know that they'll never leave your hands and enough feel for shot-making. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: George F. Wallace III

customer_reviews.title: Winn Dri  Tak Grips
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Easy to work with. Feel great on the golf clubs. Look great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Loftin

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described great item
customer_reviews.text: great feel......felt great at the range, we will see on the course. thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Magic
